name: agent-eight
description: Agent Eight - Local-First Development Sidecar Application

scripts.dev: concurrently -n engine,cockpit -c blue,magenta "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && npm run typecheck && cd ../frontend && npm run typecheck
